testsuite.name: AccountServiceTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #31
GET /api/admin/user/ should respond with status code 200, responded: 404 Password must be changed! Response body: { "timestamp" : "2024-08-25T08:57:05.711+00:00", "status" : 404, "error" : "Not Found", "message" : "No message available", "path" : "/api/admin/user/" }
